member.name: M:MetaRPC.CSharpMT5.MT5Account.ConnectByHostPortAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Connects to the MT5 terminal using credentials provided in the constructor.
member.param: The IP address or domain of the MT5 server.
The port on which the MT5 server listens (default is 443).
The base chart symbol to use (e.g., "EURUSD").
Whether to wait for terminal readiness before returning.
How long to wait for terminal readiness before timing out.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous connection operation.
member.exception: Thrown if the server returns an error response.
Thrown if the gRPC connection fails.

member.name: M:MetaRPC.CSharpMT5.MT5Account.Connect(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Synchronously connects to the MT5 terminal.
member.param: The port the server listens on.
Chart symbol to initialize the session.

member.param: MT5 server name from MT5 Terminal.
The base chart symbol to use (e.g., "EURUSD").
Whether to wait for terminal readiness before returning.
How long to wait for terminal readiness before timing out.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous connection operation.

member.summary: Gets the summary information for a trading account.
member.param: Optional deadline after which the request will be canceled if not completed.
Optional cancellation token to cancel the request.
member.returns: The server's response containing account summary data.

member.summary: Executes a unary gRPC call with automatic reconnection logic on recoverable errors.
member.typeparam: The result type of the unary gRPC call.
member.param: A delegate that executes the gRPC call with generated headers.
A delegate that extracts the API error from the result, if any.
Optional deadline for the gRPC call.
member.returns: The gRPC call result if successful; otherwise, an exception is thrown.
member.exception: If client is not connected before execution.
If server response contains a known API error.
If gRPC fails with a non-recoverable error.

member.summary: Gets the historical orders for the connected trading account within the specified time range asynchronously.
member.param: The start time for the history query (server time).
The end time for the history query (server time).
The sort mode: 0 - by open time, 1 - by close time, 2 - by ticket ID.
The page number for paginated results (default 0).
The number of items per page (default 0 = all).
Optional deadline after which the request will be canceled if not completed.
Optional cancellation token to cancel the request.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation. The result contains paged historical order data.

The page number for paginated results (default 0).
The number of items per page (default 0 = all).
Optional deadline after which the request will be canceled if not completed.
Optional cancellation token to cancel the request.
member.returns: The server's response containing paged historical order data.

member.name: M:MetaRPC.CSharpMT5.MT5Account.ExecuteStreamWithReconnect``3(``0,System.Func{``0,Grpc.Core.Metadata,System.Threading.CancellationToken,Grpc.Core.AsyncServerStreamingCall{``1}},System.Func{``1,Mt5TermApi.Error},System.Func{``1,``2},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes a gRPC server-streaming call with automatic reconnection logic on recoverable errors.
member.typeparam: The request type sent to the stream method.
The reply type received from the stream.
The extracted data type yielded to the consumer.
member.param: The request object to initiate the stream with.
A delegate that opens the stream. It receives the request, metadata headers, and cancellation token, and returns an .
A delegate that extracts the error code (if any) from a instance. Return "TERMINAL_INSTANCE_NOT_FOUND" to trigger reconnection logic, or any non-null code to throw .
A delegate that extracts the data object from a instance. Return null to skip the current message.
The gRPC metadata headers to include in the stream request.
Optional cancellation token to stop streaming and reconnection attempts.
member.returns: An of extracted items streamed from the server.
member.exception: Thrown if reconnection logic fails due to missing account context.
Thrown when the stream response contains a known API error.
Thrown if a non-recoverable gRPC error occurs.

member.name: M:MetaRPC.CSharpMT5.MT5Account.MarketBookReleaseAsync(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Releases the Depth of Market (DOM) for a symbol and stops receiving updates.
member.returns: True if DOM release was successful.

member.summary: Releases the Depth of Market (DOM) for a symbol and stops receiving updates.

Optional deadline after which the call will be cancelled.
